description: Differences between the ordinary multiplication table A004247 and Xmult table A048720, computed for {3..n} * {3..n}.
crossrefs: Cf. "Zoomed out" variant: A061858, trinv given at A054425. The first, third and fifth diagonals are given by A048728-A048730.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 11 2001
